product_name: Thule Raceway Pro 2 Bike Platform Carrier
long_description: Coupling the ease of rear bike mounting with the stability of platform carriers, you no longer have to struggle with out-of-reach roof racks or worry about flimsy bike straps on the highway.
short_description: Coupling the ease of rear bike mounting with the stability of platform carriers, you no longer have to struggle with out-of-reach roof racks or worry about flimsy bike straps on the highway.
